story: A long time ago Robert Baratheon, Lord from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a a hunter. Everything was quiet when one day Tyrion Lannister threatened the freedom of Robert Baratheon. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Jaime Lannister, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of teleportation. During a long training session in The Vale of Arryn at Christmas, Robert Baratheon met Edric Storm. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Castle Black at the Autumnal Equinox , Robert Baratheon faced Tyrion Lannister . With the help of Edric Storm and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation , the alliance scared away  Tyrion Lannister . After the victory, the freedom was not under treat anymore. Robert Baratheon and Edric Storm celebrated in Bear Island by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a regent whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen regnant from the House Lannister. Cersei Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened  The House of Cersei Lannister . Initially Cersei Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Tommen Baratheon got stronger and learnt military strategy. In White Harbor at Christmas ,Cersei Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon and they formed an alliance. At the first day of Spring, Cersei Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon were almost in Castle Black when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Cersei Lannister used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the castle was safe again. Cersei Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon went to Moat Cailin and celebrated by getting married.

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a a bureaucrat. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the jewel of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Shae, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of fire sorcery. During a long training session in The Eyrie at Night, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Crossroads Inn at the first day of Spring , Petyr Baelish faced Bran Stark . With the help of Robert Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Bran Stark . This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the beloved the freedom. In Great Sept of Baelor celebrated with Robert Arryn by watching a play .

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as a murderer. The evil Jon Snow one day posed a threat to the castle of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Catelyn Stark to seek help. Catelyn Stark was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Ruby Ford at the first day of Spring ,Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister and they formed an alliance. Finally in Riverlands at the Winter Solstice , Tyrion Lannister faced Jon Snow . With the help of Joanna Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation , the alliance scared away  Jon Snow . This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the beloved the peace. In Kings Landing celebrated with Joanna Lannister by watching a play .

story: Once upon a time, there was a murderer whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened  the peace of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Robert Arryn to seek help. Robert Arryn was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Great Sept of Baelor at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister met Cersei Lannister and they immediately became friends. At Night, Tyrion Lannister and Cersei Lannister were almost in Seagard when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the beloved The House. In Oldstones celebrated with Cersei Lannister by  having a feast .

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a a murderer. The evil Cersei Lannister one day posed a threat to the jewel of Petyr Baelish. Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Khal Drogo got stronger and learnt gravity Control. On the way to The Iron Island at the first day of Spring, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Robert Arryn finally found Cersei Lannister in Saltpans. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Cersei Lannister. Eventually the castle was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn went to The Twins and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a spy whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House Targaryen. The evil Cersei Lannister one day posed a threat to The House of Jon Snow. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Aerys II Targaryen, Jon Snow learnt the power of fire sorcery. In Seagard at sunrise ,Jon Snow met Daenerys Targaryen and they formed an alliance. At the Winter Solstice, Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen were almost in The Vale of Arryn when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen went to Oldstones and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. The evil Jon Snow one day posed a threat to the treasure of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Petyr Baelish got stronger and learnt gravity Control. On the way to Winterfell at the Winter Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Joffrey Baratheon and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Joffrey Baratheon finally found Jon Snow in Saltpans. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Jon Snow. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the beloved the peace. In Castle Black celebrated with Joffrey Baratheon by organizing a concert .

story: Robert Baratheon was Lord for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a rebel. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the freedom of Robert Baratheon. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Robert Baratheon, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of invisibility. On the way to Kings Landing at the Summer Solstice, Robert Baratheon met Edric Storm and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Robert Baratheon with the help of Edric Storm finally found Bran Stark in The Vale of Arryn. A bloody battle begun but Robert Baratheon thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Bran Stark. This is how Robert Baratheon managed to save the beloved The House. In Red Keep celebrated with Edric Storm by playing a game .

story: A long time ago Daenerys Targaryen, Princess from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a a ruler. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened the peace of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Rhaegar Targaryen to seek help. Rhaegar Targaryen was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in White Harbor at Christmas, Daenerys Targaryen met Rhaella Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Summer Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen and Rhaella Targaryen were almost in The Ruby Ford when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the treasure was not under treat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Rhaella Targaryen celebrated in Saltpans by playing a game.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as a revolutionary. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened  The House of Tyrion Lannister . Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Daenerys Targaryen got stronger and learnt slowing Time. In Moat Cailin at the Summer Solstice ,Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister and they formed an alliance. At Christmas, Tyrion Lannister and Joanna Lannister were almost in Karhold when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used slowing Time forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the beloved the castle. In The Vale of Arryn celebrated with Joanna Lannister by listening to a storytelling .

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a an influencer. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened  the treasure of Margaery Tyrell . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Daenerys Targaryen, Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of military strategy. In The Eyrie at the Summer Solstice ,Margaery Tyrell met Mace Tyrell and they formed an alliance. At the Autumnal Equinox, Margaery Tyrell and Mace Tyrell were almost in Kings Landing when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the beloved the jewel. In The Trident celebrated with Mace Tyrell by organizing a concert .

story: A long time ago Tyrion Lannister, Lord from the House Lannister, was known to be very good as a an official. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened  the castle of Tyrion Lannister . Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Loras Tyrell got stronger and learnt gravity Control. In Karhold at the Autumnal Equinox ,Tyrion Lannister met Tywin Lannister and they formed an alliance. Finally in Raventree Hall at the Winter Solstice , Tyrion Lannister faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Tywin Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of gravity Control , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the beloved the freedom. In Winterfell celebrated with Tywin Lannister by making fireworks .

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a an influencer. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to The House of Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Willas Tyrell, Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of gravity Control. During a long training session in The Whispering Wood at the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Loras Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Loras Tyrell finally found Arya Stark in Riverlands. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Arya Stark. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the beloved the freedom. In Kings Landing celebrated with Loras Tyrell by  having a feast .

story: Jon Snow was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a squire. The evil Robert Baratheon one day posed a threat to the peace of Jon Snow. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Eddard Stark, Jon Snow learnt the power of gravity Control. In Crossroads Inn at Night ,Jon Snow met Lyarra Stark and they formed an alliance. At the Summer Solstice, Jon Snow and Lyarra Stark were almost in Deepwood Motte when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used gravity Control forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Jon Snow and Lyarra Stark went to The Ruby Ford and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a mass murderer whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a Queen regnant from the House Baratheon. Cersei Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened  the treasure of Cersei Lannister . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Catelyn Stark, Cersei Lannister learnt the power of mind controlling. In The Vale of Arryn at Night ,Cersei Lannister met Joanna Lannister and they formed an alliance. At Christmas, Cersei Lannister and Joanna Lannister were almost in Winterfell when they realized Daenerys Targaryen was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Cersei Lannister used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Cersei Lannister managed to save the beloved the castle. In Seagard celebrated with Joanna Lannister by playing a game .

story: A long time ago Cersei Lannister, Queen regnant from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a a mass murderer. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the jewel of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Lancel Lannister to seek help. Lancel Lannister was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in The Iron Island at Christmas, Cersei Lannister met Lancel Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Cersei Lannister with the help of Lancel Lannister finally found Petyr Baelish in The Dreadfort. A bloody battle begun but Cersei Lannister thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. This is how Cersei Lannister managed to save the beloved the castle. In Saltpans celebrated with Lancel Lannister by getting married .

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a prophet. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened  The House of Bran Stark . Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Lysa Arryn got stronger and learnt military strategy. During a long training session in The Trident at the Winter Solstice, Bran Stark met Eddard Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Eddard Stark finally found Jon Snow in Seagard. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Jon Snow. Eventually the peace was safe again. Bran Stark and Eddard Stark went to The Vale of Arryn and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time, there was a murderer whose name was Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the House Lannister. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened  the castle of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Gendry to seek help. Gendry was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Iron Island at Night, Tyrion Lannister met Shae and they immediately became friends. At the Winter Solstice, Tyrion Lannister and Shae were almost in Winterfell when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually The House was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Shae went to The Whispering Wood and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as a revolutionary. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened  the treasure of Tyrion Lannister . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Rhaenys Targaryen, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of military strategy. On the way to Raventree Hall at Night, Tyrion Lannister met Cersei Lannister and they immediately became friends. At Christmas, Tyrion Lannister and Cersei Lannister were almost in Castle Black when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used military strategy forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the beloved the jewel. In Saltpans celebrated with Cersei Lannister by organizing a concert .

story: Once upon a time, there was a soldier whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House Targaryen. Jon Snow was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened  the peace of Jon Snow . Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Hizdahr zo Loraq got stronger and learnt military strategy. On the way to Torrhen's Square at Night, Jon Snow met Aegon Targaryen and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Aegon Targaryen finally found Tyrion Lannister in The Dreadfort. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Aegon Targaryen celebrated in Torrhen's Square by  having a feast.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened the freedom of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Jaime Lannister to seek help. Jaime Lannister was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Ruby Ford at sunrise, Bran Stark met Eddard Stark and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Eddard Stark finally found Robert Baratheon in The Ruby Ford. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Robert Baratheon. After the victory, the freedom was not under treat anymore. Bran Stark and Eddard Stark celebrated in White Harbor by playing a game.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a an assassin. Everything was quiet when one day Daenerys Targaryen threatened the jewel of Arya Stark. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Shae to seek help. Shae was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in The Twins at Christmas, Arya Stark met Eddard Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Twins at Christmas , Arya Stark faced Daenerys Targaryen . With the help of Eddard Stark and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Daenerys Targaryen . Eventually the castle was safe again. Arya Stark and Eddard Stark went to Bear Island and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the freedom of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Aerys II Targaryen got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. In Red Keep at sunrise ,Margaery Tyrell met Tommen Baratheon and they formed an alliance. At the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell and Tommen Baratheon were almost in White Harbor when they realized Arya Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Tommen Baratheon celebrated in Kings Landing by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a procurer whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the House Tyrell. The evil Tyrion Lannister one day posed a threat to the castle of Petyr Baelish. Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Robert Arryn got stronger and learnt slowing Time. During a long training session in Oldstones at the Summer Solstice, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Robert Arryn finally found Tyrion Lannister in The Vale of Arryn. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to slowing Time powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn went to White Harbor and celebrated by getting married.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an advisor. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened  the treasure of Petyr Baelish . Petyr Baelish did not know what to do and went to Daario Naharis to seek help. Daario Naharis was a master of slowing Time and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Deepwood Motte at sunrise, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they immediately became friends. Finally in Bear Island at Night , Petyr Baelish faced Robert Baratheon . With the help of Robert Arryn and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Robert Baratheon . This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the beloved the treasure. In Crossroads Inn celebrated with Robert Arryn by playing a game .

story: A long time ago Jon Snow, King from the House Targaryen, was known to be very good as a a spy. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the treasure of Jon Snow. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Rhaenys Targaryen, Jon Snow learnt the power of mind controlling. In The Iron Island at Christmas ,Jon Snow met Lyanna Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Lyanna Stark finally found Bran Stark in Kings Landing. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Bran Stark. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the beloved the peace. In Karhold celebrated with Lyanna Stark by organizing a concert .

story: A long time ago Robert Baratheon, Lord from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a a military leader. The evil Bran Stark one day posed a threat to the freedom of Robert Baratheon. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Robert Baratheon, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of mind controlling. During a long training session in The Trident at the Winter Solstice, Robert Baratheon met Steffon Baratheon. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Robert Baratheon with the help of Steffon Baratheon finally found Bran Stark in The Dreadfort. A bloody battle begun but Robert Baratheon thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Bran Stark. After the victory, the jewel was not under treat anymore. Robert Baratheon and Steffon Baratheon celebrated in The Ruby Ford by watching a play.

story: Daenerys Targaryen was Princess for the House Targaryen and was also known in the whole kingdom as a revolutionary. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to The House of Daenerys Targaryen. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Mace Tyrell, Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of teleportation. On the way to Red Keep at the Winter Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen met Ygritte and they immediately became friends. At the Summer Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen and Ygritte were almost in Red Keep when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Daenerys Targaryen used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Daenerys Targaryen managed to save the beloved the peace. In Crossroads Inn celebrated with Ygritte by organizing a concert .

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a a bureaucrat. The evil Tyrion Lannister one day posed a threat to The House of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Arya Stark, Petyr Baelish learnt the power of teleportation. In Oldstones at Christmas ,Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they formed an alliance. At Christmas, Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn were almost in Saltpans when they realized Tyrion Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually The House was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn went to Moat Cailin and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Cersei Lannister was Queen regnant for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a mass murderer. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the freedom of Cersei Lannister. Initially Cersei Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Viserys Targaryen got stronger and learnt mind controlling. During a long training session in Great Sept of Baelor at Night, Cersei Lannister met Lancel Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Cersei Lannister with the help of Lancel Lannister finally found Bran Stark in The Eyrie. A bloody battle begun but Cersei Lannister thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Bran Stark. This is how Cersei Lannister managed to save the beloved the castle. In The Eyrie celebrated with Lancel Lannister by getting married .

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was a Queen consort from the House Tyrell. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the peace of Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Daario Naharis, Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of military strategy. During a long training session in Kings Landing at sunrise, Margaery Tyrell met Tommen Baratheon. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Riverlands at the Summer Solstice , Margaery Tyrell faced Bran Stark . With the help of Tommen Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Bran Stark . This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the beloved the peace. In The Vale of Arryn celebrated with Tommen Baratheon by  having a feast .

story: Jon Snow was King for the House Targaryen and was also known in the whole kingdom as a soldier. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened the freedom of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Rhaegar Targaryen to seek help. Rhaegar Targaryen was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Saltpans at Night, Jon Snow met Viserys Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Night, Jon Snow and Viserys Targaryen were almost in Bear Island when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Viserys Targaryen celebrated in The Iron Island by getting married.

story: A long time ago Cersei Lannister, Queen regnant from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a a regent. The evil Bran Stark one day posed a threat to the treasure of Cersei Lannister. Initially Cersei Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Tywin Lannister got stronger and learnt mind controlling. On the way to Riverlands at Christmas, Cersei Lannister met Lancel Lannister and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Cersei Lannister with the help of Lancel Lannister finally found Bran Stark in Saltpans. A bloody battle begun but Cersei Lannister thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Bran Stark. After the victory, the freedom was not under treat anymore. Cersei Lannister and Lancel Lannister celebrated in Riverlands by listening to a storytelling.

story: A long time ago Cersei Lannister, Queen regnant from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a a regent. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the peace of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Arya Stark to seek help. Arya Stark was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. In Red Keep at the Summer Solstice ,Cersei Lannister met Shae and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Cersei Lannister with the help of Shae finally found Bran Stark in Moat Cailin. A bloody battle begun but Cersei Lannister thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Bran Stark. Eventually the castle was safe again. Cersei Lannister and Shae went to White Harbor and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the peace of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Renly Baratheon got stronger and learnt teleportation. In Seagard at the Autumnal Equinox ,Bran Stark met Sansa Stark and they formed an alliance. At the Summer Solstice, Bran Stark and Sansa Stark were almost in The Dreadfort when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Bran Stark used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the beloved the freedom. In Oldstones celebrated with Sansa Stark by listening to a storytelling .

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as a murderer. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened  the castle of Tyrion Lannister . Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Joanna Lannister to seek help. Joanna Lannister was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. In The Whispering Wood at the Autumnal Equinox ,Tyrion Lannister met Joanna Lannister and they formed an alliance. At the Winter Solstice, Tyrion Lannister and Joanna Lannister were almost in The Whispering Wood when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Tyrion Lannister used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Joanna Lannister celebrated in White Harbor by getting married.

story: Robert Baratheon was King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men for the House Baratheon and was also known in the whole kingdom as a ruler. Robert Baratheon was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened  the treasure of Robert Baratheon . Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Tyrion Lannister, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of gravity Control. During a long training session in The Dreadfort at sunrise, Robert Baratheon met Steffon Baratheon. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Robert Baratheon with the help of Steffon Baratheon finally found Tyrion Lannister in The Iron Island. A bloody battle begun but Robert Baratheon thanks to gravity Control powers got the better of Tyrion Lannister. After the victory, the peace was not under treat anymore. Robert Baratheon and Steffon Baratheon celebrated in Riverlands by  having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a hunter whose name was Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was a King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men from the House Baratheon. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the jewel of Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon did not know what to do and went to Cersei Lannister to seek help. Cersei Lannister was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in The Eyrie at Christmas, Robert Baratheon met Gendry. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Crossroads Inn at the first day of Spring , Robert Baratheon faced Petyr Baelish . With the help of Gendry and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Petyr Baelish . Eventually the jewel was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Gendry went to Raventree Hall and celebrated by getting married.

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a an influencer. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened  the jewel of Margaery Tyrell . Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Lancel Lannister to seek help. Lancel Lannister was a master of gravity Control and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Winterfell at the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Torrhen's Square at the Autumnal Equinox , Margaery Tyrell faced Tyrion Lannister . With the help of Willas Tyrell and thanks to the learnt power of gravity Control , the alliance scared away  Tyrion Lannister . After the victory, the freedom was not under treat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell celebrated in Oldstones by organizing a concert.

story: A long time ago Robert Baratheon, Lord from the House Baratheon, was known to be very good as a a military leader. The evil Arya Stark one day posed a threat to The House of Robert Baratheon. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Tommen Baratheon, Robert Baratheon learnt the power of slowing Time. On the way to Castle Black at sunrise, Robert Baratheon met Edric Storm and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Robert Baratheon with the help of Edric Storm finally found Arya Stark in The Vale of Arryn. A bloody battle begun but Robert Baratheon thanks to slowing Time powers got the better of Arya Stark. Eventually the castle was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Edric Storm went to Crossroads Inn and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: Arya Stark was Lady for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a warrior. The evil Jon Snow one day posed a threat to the peace of Arya Stark. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Cassana Baratheon to seek help. Cassana Baratheon was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in The Ruby Ford at sunrise, Arya Stark met Bran Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Night, Arya Stark and Bran Stark were almost in The Ruby Ford when they realized Jon Snow was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Arya Stark used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the treasure was safe again. Arya Stark and Bran Stark went to Great Sept of Baelor and celebrated by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Arya Stark, Lady from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a vigilante. Arya Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened  the jewel of Arya Stark . Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Arya Stark to seek help. Arya Stark was a master of slowing Time and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Oldstones at the first day of Spring, Arya Stark met Catelyn Stark and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark with the help of Catelyn Stark finally found Jon Snow in Karhold. A bloody battle begun but Arya Stark thanks to slowing Time powers got the better of Jon Snow. This is how Arya Stark managed to save the beloved the peace. In The Eyrie celebrated with Catelyn Stark by  having a feast .

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened  the jewel of Bran Stark . Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Tywin Lannister got stronger and learnt slowing Time. In White Harbor at the first day of Spring ,Bran Stark met Sansa Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Sansa Stark finally found Margaery Tyrell in The Iron Island. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to slowing Time powers got the better of Margaery Tyrell. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the beloved the jewel. In Castle Black celebrated with Sansa Stark by organizing a concert .

story: Once upon a time, there was a spy whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a Lord from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the freedom of Jon Snow. Initially Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Rickon Stark got stronger and learnt mind controlling. During a long training session in Saltpans at the Autumnal Equinox, Jon Snow met Aegon Targaryen. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in The Twins at the Summer Solstice , Jon Snow faced Arya Stark . With the help of Aegon Targaryen and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling , the alliance scared away  Arya Stark . Eventually the treasure was safe again. Jon Snow and Aegon Targaryen went to The Iron Island and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess from the House Targaryen. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the jewel of Daenerys Targaryen. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  King, Daenerys Targaryen learnt the power of mind controlling. In White Harbor at sunrise ,Daenerys Targaryen met Ygritte and they formed an alliance. Finally in Raventree Hall at Christmas , Daenerys Targaryen faced Petyr Baelish . With the help of Ygritte and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling , the alliance scared away  Petyr Baelish . This is how Daenerys Targaryen managed to save the beloved The House. In Castle Black celebrated with Ygritte by organizing a concert .

story: Jon Snow was King for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a ruler. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the castle of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Willas Tyrell to seek help. Willas Tyrell was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Dreadfort at Christmas, Jon Snow met Rhaella Targaryen and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Rhaella Targaryen finally found Arya Stark in Great Sept of Baelor. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to fire sorcery powers got the better of Arya Stark. After the victory, the freedom was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Rhaella Targaryen celebrated in Kings Landing by making fireworks.

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a a bureaucrat. The evil Cersei Lannister one day posed a threat to the freedom of Petyr Baelish. Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Steffon Baratheon got stronger and learnt teleportation. In Seagard at Night ,Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Petyr Baelish with the help of Lysa Arryn finally found Cersei Lannister in Kings Landing. A bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Cersei Lannister. Eventually the castle was safe again. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn went to Castle Black and celebrated by listening to a storytelling.

story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a an influencer. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened the jewel of Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Steffon Baratheon, Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of slowing Time. On the way to Red Keep at Christmas, Margaery Tyrell met Joffrey Baratheon and they immediately became friends. At the Winter Solstice, Margaery Tyrell and Joffrey Baratheon were almost in White Harbor when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used slowing Time forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the beloved the peace. In Raventree Hall celebrated with Joffrey Baratheon by making fireworks .

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a a murderer. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened  The House of Petyr Baelish . Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Margaery Tyrell got stronger and learnt mind controlling. During a long training session in Great Sept of Baelor at the first day of Spring, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Autumnal Equinox, Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn were almost in Riverlands when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn celebrated in Deepwood Motte by making fireworks.
